messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Dads at conference
messages.msgSnippet: I know I enjoyed the last conference a lot!  I spent at least as much time playing with the crafts and stuff as my children did :) ... -- Daniel ( Blogging at
messages.messageBody:
I know I enjoyed the last conference a lot! I spent at least as much
time playing with the crafts and stuff as my children did :)

On 4/8/06, Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
> There are lotsa Dads at the unschooling conferences...it's a family
> thing after all!!:) Ben Lovejoy will be hosting the SSUDS (Secret
> Society of Unschooling Dads) group again, which is ONLY for men.
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com

Albert Einstein

messages.subject: Dads at conference
messages.msgSnippet: There are lotsa Dads at the unschooling conferences...it s a family thing after all!!:)  Ben Lovejoy will be hosting the SSUDS (Secret Society of Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
There are lotsa Dads at the unschooling conferences...it's a family
thing after all!!:) Ben Lovejoy will be hosting the SSUDS (Secret
Society of Unschooling Dads) group again, which is ONLY for men.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
